name: Cube Fall
description:
A simple mini-game where you have to avoid squares and collect some other geometric shapes to score points while listening to some awesome music.

Features

  • A Normal Mode, the speed of the game depends on the points you have.
  • A Spectrum Mode, the music affects the speed and pace of the game.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move left or right
  • N to change the music (only in the main menu)
  • Esc to bring up the pause menu
